alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:40PM AKST until December 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Visibilities reduced to as low as one half mile. Northerly winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel may be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility reductions due to blowing snow will begin with the onset of light snow this evening. Winds will begin to diminish Sunday morning allowing visibility to improve.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
